name: Pacifly
description:
This is my submission for the MashUp Game Jam 2 the theme was UNCONVENTIONAL MEANS

 

In this game you play as a pacifist rocket shot from a rocket turret who dose not wan't to get destroyed so you need to help. You control the rocket and avoid the enemies and walls.

Controls:

W: Up

S: Down

The game was made with Unity. I used BeepBox for the music and ChipTone for the sound effects. The font used is DotGothic16

I hope you enjoy playing my game.
